name: Accenture Strategy
tagline: Global IT/digital consulting giant with dedicated strategy practice—massive scale, deep tech integration
known_for: One of the world's largest consulting firms with 779,000 employees globally. Accenture Strategy is the pure strategy arm within a massive technology and digital consulting organization, offering deep tech capabilities and implementation firepower that pure strategy firms cannot match.
career_path: Analyst (2-3 yrs) → Consultant (2-3 yrs) → Manager (2-3 yrs) → Senior Manager (3-4 yrs) → Managing Director

recruiting.process: Application → Online Assessment → First Round (2 case + 1 fit/behavioral) → Final Round (2 case + 1 fit/behavioral)
recruiting.unique: Focus on tech-enabled business strategy. Cases often involve digital transformation, data analytics, and technology implementation considerations beyond pure strategy.
recruiting.timeline: Rolling recruiting year-round, with peak hiring in fall for summer internships and full-time roles

name: Bain & Company
tagline: Results-driven MBB firm—built on PE expertise and Results Delivery®
description: Bain & Company is a global consultancy that helps the world's most ambitious change makers define the future. Across 65 cities in 40 countries, we work alongside our clients as one team with a shared ambition to achieve extraordinary results, outperform the competition, and redefine industries. We complement our tailored, integrated expertise with a vibrant ecosystem of digital innovators to deliver better, faster, and more enduring outcomes. Our 10-year commitment to invest more than $1 billion in pro bono services brings our talent, expertise, and insight to organizations tackling today's urgent challenges in education, racial equity, social justice, economic development, and the environment. We earned a platinum rating from EcoVadis, the leading platform for environmental, social, and ethical performance ratings for global supply chains, putting us in the top 1% of all companies. Since our founding in 1973, we have measured our success by the success of our clients, and we proudly maintain the highest level of client
known_for: Founded by BCG partners in 1973 with a revolutionary focus on delivering results, not just recommendations. Dominates private equity consulting (serves 75%+ of global PE firms) and pioneered the Results Delivery® methodology. Known for strong culture, entrepreneurial spirit, and unmatched client loyalty through outcome-based engagement model.
career_path: Associate Consultant (2-3 yrs) → Senior Associate Consultant (1-2 yrs) → Consultant (2-3 yrs) → Case Team Leader (2-3 yrs) → Manager (2-3 yrs) → Principal (3-4 yrs) → Partner

recruiting.process: Application → Testing (aptitude + psychometric) → Phone/Video Screen (20 min behavioral) → First Round (2 case interviews, 40 min each) → Final Round (2 case interviews, 40 min each)
recruiting.unique: Required aptitude assessment testing logical reasoning and math, plus psychometric evaluation for culture fit. Candidate-led case format (like BCG). Highly competitive 1-2% acceptance rate. Process takes 4-6 weeks total with ~14 days between stages.
recruiting.timeline: Applications open July, close September-November (varies by school). Submit 4-5 days before deadline. First rounds in fall, offers by late fall/early winter. Earlier deadlines than prior years.

byu.tip: Strong BYU presence with 54+ current alumni. Network early with Bain's MBA and undergraduate recruiting teams. Consider offices in SF, Seattle, and LA for West Coast proximity.

name: Boston Consulting Group
tagline: One of the most prestigious strategy consulting firms—pioneer in business strategy since 1963
description: Boston Consulting Group partners with leaders in business and society to tackle their most important challenges and capture their greatest opportunities. BCG was the pioneer in business strategy when it was founded in 1963. Today, we work closely with clients to embrace a transformational approach aimed at benefiting all stakeholders—empowering organizations to grow, build sustainable competitive advantage, and drive positive societal impact. Our diverse, global teams bring deep industry and functional expertise and a range of perspectives that question the status quo and spark change. BCG delivers solutions through leading-edge management consulting, technology and design, and corporate and digital ventures. We work in a uniquely collaborative model across the firm and throughout all levels of the client organization, fueled by the goal of helping our clients thrive and enabling them to make the world a better place.
known_for: BCG is part of the elite MBB trio and is known for pioneering the BCG Matrix for portfolio management. The firm emphasizes breakthrough thinking and innovation, combining deep industry expertise with cutting-edge digital capabilities through BCG X. Known for the PTO program (Predictability, Teaming & Open Communication) to support work-life balance.
career_path: Associate (2-3 yrs) → Consultant (2-3 yrs) → Project Leader (2-3 yrs) → Principal (3-4 yrs) → Partner

recruiting.process: Application → Online Assessment (Pymetrics for some offices) → Video Interview → First Round (2 case + behavioral) → Final Round (2 case + behavioral)
recruiting.unique: BCG uses candidate-led cases where you drive the structure and analysis. Some offices require Pymetrics digital assessment and one-way video interview before live rounds. Known for testing business intuition and creative problem-solving.
recruiting.timeline: MBA applications open September/October, offers by early winter. Undergrads should apply summer before senior year. Process takes 2-3 months with ~14 days between stages. Interviews may be scheduled on consecutive days.

byu.tip: BCG has strong BYU representation with 49 current alumni (BYU + Marriott combined). Focus on networking with BCG alumni and emphasize analytical rigor and creative problem-solving in your applications.

name: Deloitte Consulting
tagline: Largest global professional services network with 415,000 employees worldwide
description: Deloitte is a global professional services firm focused on driving progress. They help clients become leaders wherever they choose to compete by combining advice with action and integrity. The organization operates as a network of legally separate member firms under Deloitte Touche Tohmatsu Limited (DTTL).
known_for: As a Big Four firm, Deloitte combines deep industry expertise across audit, tax, and advisory with a massive global consulting practice. Strategy & Analytics (S&A) is their pure strategy arm, offering higher compensation and more selective recruiting than the broader consulting division. Known for quantitative rigor, financial modeling strength, and extensive Fortune 500 audit relationships.
career_path: Analyst (2-3 yrs) → Senior Consultant (2-3 yrs) → Manager (2-3 yrs) → Senior Manager (2-3 yrs) → Associate Partner → Partner → Managing Partner

recruiting.process: Application → HR Screen (optional) → First Round (1-2 case + 1-2 behavioral) → Final Round (1-2 case + 1-2 behavioral + group case)
recruiting.unique: Group case interview in final round—one of few firms that uses this format. Emphasizes teamwork and cultural fit alongside case performance. Offers Consulting Immersion Program (DCIP) for MBA admits.
recruiting.timeline: Rolling applications year-round, process typically takes 4-6 weeks from application to offer

byu.tip: Deloitte actively recruits at BYU and is listed as a target school. Focus on Strategy & Analytics (S&A) for best compensation and exit opportunities. Strong accounting and finance background is valued. Network with recruiters early—they have significant hiring power at Deloitte.

name: Innosight
tagline: Clayton Christensen's disruptive innovation firm—now part of Huron
known_for: Co-founded by Clayton Christensen, pioneer of disruptive innovation theory. Known for Jobs-to-be-Done framework, dual transformation methodology, and working with Fortune 50 companies on innovation strategy and growth transformation.

recruiting.process: Application → First Round (2 case interviews, 30 min each + fit questions) → Second Round (5-hour group case with observation + partner interview)
recruiting.unique: Group case exercise in final round where candidates work together on a case packet while being observed. Cases are candidate-led and focus heavily on strategic thinking with minimal quantitative analysis.
recruiting.timeline: Full process typically takes under 4 weeks from application to offer

name: McKinsey & Company
tagline: The most prestigious name in strategy consulting with unmatched brand recognition and Fortune 500 CEO alumni network
known_for: Unmatched brand prestige as the original modern management consultancy, founder of the case interview method, renowned for analytical rigor and producing Fortune 500 CEOs. Known for its 'up or out' promotion culture and prestigious alumni network including Sheryl Sandberg, James Gorman, and Lou Gerstner.
career_path: Business Analyst (2-3 yrs) → Associate (2-3 yrs) → Engagement Manager (2-3 yrs) → Associate Principal (2-3 yrs) → Partner (5+ yrs) → Senior Partner

recruiting.process: Application → McKinsey Solve Game → First Round (2 interviews: case + PEI each) → Final Round (2-3 interviews: case + PEI each) → Offer
recruiting.unique: McKinsey Solve digital assessment (gamified problem-solving game) required for nearly all candidates before interviews. Interviewer-led case format. Pass rate under 20% for Solve Game. Known for rigorous analytical problem-solving focus.
recruiting.timeline: On-cycle recruiting happens in fall with offers for summer/fall start dates. Entire process takes 5-8 weeks from application to offer. Final round typically occurs 1-2 weeks after first round.

byu.tip: Apply to offices where you have a genuine interest in working. Strong preparation for McKinsey Solve Game is essential as pass rate is under 20%.

name: Porsche Consulting
tagline: Automotive excellence meets lean operations—'Strategic Vision, Smart Implementation' from Porsche's DNA
known_for: Born from Porsche's successful turnaround in the 1990s, Porsche Consulting brings automotive operational excellence to clients worldwide. Known for 'Strategic Vision, Smart Implementation'—combining strategic thinking with pragmatic, hands-on execution. Deep expertise in lean manufacturing, supply chain optimization, and end-to-end transformation.
career_path: Analyst → Consultant (2 yrs) → Senior Consultant (2-3 yrs) → Manager (3-4 yrs) → Senior Manager → Senior Expert → Associate Partner → Partner

recruiting.process: Application → HR Phone Screen (30 min, fit questions) → Case Interview Round (CV presentation + market sizing/business case + fit) → Final Round (additional cases + partner interviews)
recruiting.unique: Expect Porsche-specific questions like 'What is your favorite Porsche model and why?' Cases focus on operational and automotive topics. Very friendly, 'humane' interview style with 10-15 min prep time for market sizing cases. Firm is extremely proud of Porsche heritage.
recruiting.timeline: Process takes approximately 6 weeks from application to offer

name: Slalom
tagline: Tech-enabled consulting with no unwanted travel—local delivery model and strong work-life balance
known_for: Unique local delivery model with 'no unwanted travel' policy that allows consultants to work where they live. Strong Microsoft partnership (Gold Partner since 2005) and tech implementation expertise. Historically praised for superior work-life balance compared to traditional consulting firms.
career_path: Consultant (2-3 yrs) → Senior Consultant (2-3 yrs) → Principal (3-4 yrs) → Director (3-4 yrs) → Managing Director

recruiting.process: Application → Phone Screen (behavioral) → Virtual Interview Rounds (2-3 case + behavioral) → Final Round (case + behavioral + potential written case)
recruiting.unique: Lighter emphasis on case interviews compared to traditional consulting firms. Heavy focus on behavioral questions and cultural fit. Values candidates with some professional experience.
recruiting.timeline: 3-4 weeks from application to decision. Rolling applications throughout the year.

byu.tip: Leverage BYU alumni network, particularly in Seattle and Denver offices. Strong fit for candidates interested in technology consulting with better work-life balance. Salt Lake City office may be particularly BYU-friendly given proximity to Utah.
